instructions: From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under APPLICATIONS , tap Application manager . Swipe left and select one of the following: DOWNLOADED SD CARD RUNNING ALL Touch the desired app. Tap Clear cache . Tap Clear data . Tap OK .
From the home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under SYSTEM , tap Storage . Wait for the Cached data section to calculate. Tap Clear cache . Tap Clear data . Tap OK .
From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under APPLICATIONS , tap Application manager . Touch and hold the desired app. Tap Uninstall . Tap OK .
